Description: How long it takes for the boss to gain a random strength (seconds)
Boss has a chance to gain invincibility every second
Chance of gaining invincibility after one cycle

Variable Name: Boss Buff Strengthen Health Buff Ratio
Description: Maximum health buff ratio (current health is also buffed by this value)

Variable Name: Boss Buff Strengthen Damage Buff Ratio

Description: Player has a chance to gain darkness every second
Chance of gaining darkness after one cycle
The higher the value, the stronger the darkness will be
